body.name: Hapgo Girls Beauty Salon Set, Doll Head Hair Stylist Toy Kit, 27 PCS Pretend Play Hair Styling Set with Blow Dryer, Barber Apron and Styling Accessories Toys for Girls Ages 3-9
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 21 hrs 33 mins
features: Kids Beauty Salon Set: Our Hapgo beauty hair stylist set includes all the 27 tools you need at a barber shop. You will get: realistic hair dryer, stylist apron, shawl, toolbag, 2 scissors, mirror, 2 hair ties, 4 hair rollers hair straightener, hair curler, hair pin, hair clips, comb, curling iron brush, vip card, perfume bottle, hair spray bottle, essential oil bottle, shampoo bottle, and conditioner bottle. Everything is placed in a beautiful gift box for easy storage.

Realistic Hair Dryer: The pretend hairdryer can blow air and create noise just like a real one, powered by 1 AA battery (not included). Our well-designed apron sets make your kids look exactly like a barber or a stylist, thus making the role-playing game more immersive. Come and fulfill the beauty dream of your kid!

Safe Vanity Salon Playset: Made of ABS plastic, non-toxic and BPA-free, our playset has no terrible odor or sharp edges to ensure safety for your little princess. Let your little girls enjoy the endless fun of beauty salon, pretend hairdressers and pretend stylists! It's recommended for ages 3 and up.

Fun Beauty Salon Toys Set: Isn't it fun to watch your kids pretending to blow their hair or have a haircut for you? Our hairdresser kit will inspire your child's imagination and creativity and keep them enthralled for hours. Enjoy the joy that comes with owning your own hair salon.

Best Gift Choice: The educational play vanity kit is a perfect gift for anyone who loves playing hairdressers. They will practice and perfect their hairstyling skills with this fun kit, and create stylish hairstyles for friends and family! perfect for birthdays, role play, Christmas and other holidays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Granddaughter loved it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun to use make believe and Imagination...
reviews.reviewText: the world of Make Believe magic and Imagination it really should never disappear. And sometimes we had children that child deep inside of us always seems to come out in some way.For me I wanted to be a cosmetologist so I've always liked to do hair nails makeup and more and that's exactly what I became a cosmetologist now that my daughter is 6 years old she wants to follow in my footsteps yes I wanted her to be president but whenever makes her happy is best for me so I went ahead and got her this cosmetology accessory set because she does have the Barbie mannequin that she got for her birthday about a month back I thought it came with the accessories but only if you so I needed to get her this now this one is really nice and what I love about it is that it comes very soon plastic holder suitcase whatever you may want to call it and it keeps all the pieces together cuz there are some small ones as in hair ties and clips and stuff like that so after playtime I enjoy really being able to put the Pieces away in a secured place in the container suitcase that they give and it's see-through too so you can see what you need right out of the container in there comes a whole lot of accessories you have hair dryers roller brushes curlers a straightener and many other things that I'm sure is included in the description as far as how the pieces are well it's really good quality they do not easily break and my daughter is learning how to get knots out of her Barbie mannequin head so I know that the brushes and combs that came with this set have to be really strong or they would have broke by now but we're doing good so far... So is like every other girl normally they like the hair accessories this was a fantastic gift and I think it would be an even better fantastic gift to be able to give it to another little child who likes this it a nice size which makes a nice gift and it opens up to creativity DIYs imagination and basically art I look at art and cosmetology because that's what I do cosmetology I think this is a good start for your child to begin to learn how to style and brush and take care of their doll's hair which will rub off for them to be able to do their own in the near future. Thank you and I hope this review was helpful enough for you to make your decision here and again I think it makes a great gift so thank you and thank you Amazon for a great prices and products...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids who love pretend play!
reviews.reviewText: This came with a lot of different pieces. Although they really weren't the best quality, my kids still enjoyed them and had a blast. I did find some of the pieces cheaply made. One of my kids accidentally stepped on one of the rollers and it cracked and broke. The hair dryer is really neat though, and the aprons make it even more realistic for them which is great. This is a really great set for kids who love to pretend play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun Salon/Barber kit for toddlers and little kids
reviews.reviewText: My kid absolutely loved this Pretend Salon and Barber kit!The first thing I love as a parent, is that it comes with it's own storage case.As a parent, it's sometimes frustrating to get fun toys, with LOTS of tiny pieces, that don't come with storage cases for the toy. I was extremely pleased that this toy makes clean up time easy when we're done playing.This kit comes with lots of fun pieces, including a little haircut cape for "clients", an apron and a barber's belt. I like the pretend flat iron and curling iron, because they help with coordination and focus, all while playing.I would definitely recommend this product for any little "beauty enthusiast" in your life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was the perfect little girl gift for open ended play. The pieces were durable, easy to clean, and bright colored.

reviews.reviewText: A huge gift set with lots of options to play with. Cleans up easily and all goes away neatly and long as nothing gets lost
